channel.title: Learning on the agenda doesn't mean learning happened
channel.description:
The flight from Amsterdam to Jakarta is 16 hours, but it feels even longer when you know you have to fly right back. I was on the hook to present a research project on growing bell peppers to the Minister of Agriculture.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://peerlearning.is/making-learning-happen/

item.title: Learning on the agenda doesn't mean learning happened
